Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@M@PushFeatu.name: requestSdk(_:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@M@PushFeatu.abstract: Requests the Push Feature Module when it’s operational and safe to use. The provided callback will be invoked with the Push Feature Module when it’s ready.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: setDeviceToken(_:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Responsible for sending the Apple device token back to all the subscribers. It marks the end of the token registration flow. If it is unable to reach Salesforce server, it will save the token and try again later.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: deviceToken()
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Returns the device token as a String.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: setPushEnabled(pushEnabled:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Developer override to set the state of push enablement to true/false. If set to false, the application will not receive any push notifications once the Marketing Cloud server has been updated.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: isPushEnabled()
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Combination of push enabled from user notifications settings and push enabled by sdk.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: setNotificationResponse(_:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Informs the module of the current notification response when user clicks a notification.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: notificationResponse()
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Returns the last notification response delivered to the module.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: setNotificationUserInfo(_:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Informs the module of the current userInfo when user clicks a notification.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: notificationUserInfo()
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Returns the user info of the last notification delivered to the module.

Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.name: setURLHandlingDelegate(_:)
Classes/PushFeature.html#/c:@CM@PushFeat.abstract: Set URLHandling delegate to handle URLs in OpenDirect URLs, CloudPage URLs, CloudPage URLs from inbox messages

Classes/PushFeatureConfigBuilder.html#/c.name: build()
Classes/PushFeatureConfigBuilder.html#/c.abstract: Creates a PushFeatureConfig containing the current builder configuration settings. This can be passed to the ConfigBuilder method(s)

Classes/PushFeatureConfigBuilder.html#/c.name: setApplicationControlsBadging(_:)
Classes/PushFeatureConfigBuilder.html#/c.abstract: Sets the configuration value which allows sdk to control application badge count

Classes/PushFeature.html.name: PushFeature
Classes/PushFeature.html.abstract: The main API class of PushFeature module
